I order pizza with delivery, the pizzeria itself was not, of course, if it is not the same pizzeria that was once at the intersection of Dnieper Embankment. and Princely Zaton.
I have no complaints about the filling, it is probably the best in Kyiv, both in terms of product quality and variety, although ready-made recipes are not indisputable. But the dough is too thin, which makes the pieces not very easy to eat with your hands and generally disproportionate to the thickness of the filling (I understand that our scoop audience thin cake - a sign of quality, but do not always have to go to the ignorant). At the same time, the sides, on the other hand, are very thick and wide, it would be better if their volume moved to the middle of the cake (the sides with the filling cost - I didn't like it). Given that pizzas are made by hand, it would be appropriate to offer 2 types of cakes - normal, with a uniform thickness throughout the radius in a ratio of 1.5: 1 to the filling, and the current, for the elite. Pizza larger than large would also be appropriate.
A little surprising is the food paper in the box instead of the foil, to which the filling often sticks. I don't see any sense in cutting pizza into many narrow pieces either, who at home will cut it smaller, and for those outside the home it will make consumption even more difficult.
The site is easy to order, makes communication optional, which is convenient for all parties. Punctuality is also high, so far there have been no problems.

P.S. Don't take pizza with salmon (Portobello) - it's just a misunderstanding, I'm shooting one star. In general, half of the fillings were created by some sick logic with poorly combined components.
Of those who liked: Diablo, Truffles, Hawaii, Paperoni, Margarita, Country, Mamamia, Porcini, Cheese.

P.P.S. For some time I tasted almost all the dishes - not all liked, but the quality and those I liked are quite satisfactory. The business model of the pizzeria has become clear, and it is quite smart. Ordering on the site is very convenient, and delivery is almost always on time (out of two cases when you did not have time before the specified time - called back and warned). Maybe because I live nearby, but this is the only way to get food with the right temperature.
I wish Mamami prosperity, because it is, first of all, in my interests.

About an hour later I received a call with the words "You did not have the right to pay for the certificate upon delivery! We will now send you a courier, and you will give him 500 UAH in cash! " The conversation lasted a long time! They tried to knock out UAH 500 from me! Talked like collectors with debtors! Honestly, it was even scary that under the apartment now they can wait for me! Why is the fact of unprofessionalism a client's problem ?! Why did the person who talked to me on the phone have such a tone that I was a criminal ?! Is it really impossible to monitor the storage conditions of products ?!

Yesterday, February 14, 21, I was with a friend at an establishment in the Aladdin shopping mall, they chose this establishment, because they believed that there you can eat a delicious salad and get good service. So, we received salads, ate, about 15 minutes later a security guard comes up to us and says that we have been here for a long time, we ate and went, we don't have to sit down (by the way, he didn't look very sober). What I want to say, first, we were still customers of this institution, pre-purchased salads and had the right to be in the institution, even after a meal (maybe we even wanted to buy something else, and there were enough places for other customers). Secondly, the security guard not only expressed his boorish attitude towards clients (as a representative of the institution), but also spoke Russian, while recently passed a law on the use of the Ukrainian language in services, I do not want to complain about the language, but the fact is the fact.
Unfortunately, the institution has lost its past glory, we are not going to visit it anymore, and we do not recommend it to anyone.

For many years we went to the restaurant Mamamia in Chernihiv, and were always satisfied with the quality and service, but yesterday there was a very unpleasant situation. In early March, a pre-order was made to celebrate the children's birthday on March 16. We discussed all the details with the administrator. When ordering, as we wanted to invite our animator for children, the administrator warned that this is possible only with an additional order of a master class from Mamamia, we agreed, and the administrator said that our order, including a master class, will be subject to additional discount 20% and asked to come in a couple of days to finally confirm the menu. On the 14th (two days before the holiday) during a visit to Mamamia (Chernihiv), the administrator said that the discount agreed upon would not apply. It was unpleasant, but since there were two days left before the holiday, and it was difficult to find a new place to celebrate, we decided not to cancel the order. At approximately 19:00, the administrator called and said that animation with bubbles and confetti was prohibited in the establishment! It is unclear why this information was not reported two weeks ago when placing the order, the epidemiological situation in the region has not changed in two weeks, it is unclear whether it is unprofessionalism or complete indifference to employees and management. Since the holiday on March 16 had to urgently look for another place to celebrate today, thank God we found it, and the holiday will take place.
The behavior of employees is unprofessional and indifferent, customer orientation is completely absent, and led to a bad mood and almost led to a spoiled holiday.

The fact is that the dry pasta was already heated for some time (because they forgot about the order and it was worth it); and then they were reheated in the microwave - and it was rubber and not pasta, after two reheats!

8.06 ordered a children's master class on making pizza and lemonade. This was our first and last visit to Mamamia.
Background: I call on Sunday, find out the cost of master classes (mc). The administrator (or a person who just picks up the phone) gives the following information: mk pizza - 600 UAH, mk lemonade -350 UAH + additional payment for the recipe of each pizza 130-150 UAH. with a child.
I inquired about the time of the mc, they said that the last one was at 4:00 p.m.
I'm calling on Monday. Another administrator (or the person who picks up the phone) provides the same information on the cost, but says that the time may be later than 16-00 (as I needed). !!!!! Provides all information in Russian !!!! The law "On the state language"? ... Doesn't exist for you? ...

So ... Let's sign up for mk. And we count: 2 microns - 950 UAH + for a prescription for 7 children 150 * 7. It turns out 2000 UAH.

After the MC we receive a check for UAH 950 + UAH 1701 = UAH 2651.

We conclude that administrators (or people who pick up the phone are not competent at all in the pricing policy of the institution, or this is the policy of the institution: to say one thing and brazenly SHUT the other. It's just disgusting ... I will not advise anyone sharashkin office.

The child became ill during mk. She almost lost consciousness. The staff was not ready for this. They just stood and watched, didn't even bring a glass of water. Water was offered when we brought the child to consciousness.
I just have no words ..... I definitely do not recommend this institution to anyone !!!

Hello! More than a year ago, I had the opportunity to visit your restaurant on Victory Avenue with my family and was unpleasantly surprised that the grissini, which was served as a supplement to the main dishes, was baked with long hair. However, I am an optimist and decided that mistakes happen and one should not judge all employees of the company on one occasion ... What a fool I am! Yesterday, 04.07.2021, at 16:47. I called 7492 and at 16:48. I got a call back from +380634173008 and accepted my order to make one pizza "Five cheeses" with self-pickup from the restaurant on Victory Avenue. The order was accepted for the near future, which provided (according to the operator) 10-15 minutes for its execution. In fulfillment of my obligations, I immediately went to the restaurant in my own car and at the entrance to it, at 5:10 p.m. received your message about the readiness of the order for delivery, and at 17:13. went into a restaurant and asked an administrator named Alexander to place an order for me. A few minutes later the administrator informed me that there was a failure, "the system did not issue a check", so my order began to prepare in front of my eyes with the assurance that I should wait 10 minutes (without a normal apology or any explanation ...). At 5:23 p.m. I paid by card for the order and received unbaked pizza, which caused me and my wife to have indigestion. At the same time, the check of the order itself for some reason contained information about the time of its issuance at 17:51. that day. It's like some kind of continuous "namahalovo". Thanks. Some negative emotions after visiting your restaurant and the service received!

There were no spoons for the soup, the green dragon roll does not keep its shape when you take it with chopsticks, because the cucumber fills it with its own moisture. The design of the package is very beautiful, but for the rolls you need to take paper material with a larger number of microns, since the bottom gets wet - conduct an independent test. In general, it is delicious. Am I ready to place an order for an average check of UAH 700 every week with an indication of all points? - no, I order from you very rarely, I prefer Egersund. I am sharing my experience for the second time.
Twice you ordered delivery to the office and twice you did not sign for the soups. How comfortable do you think it is to dig into soups to distinguish the composition and decide who has which soup?

So we went:
FIRST delivery - 4 sets of lunches - nothing signed. Food quality: the fish cutlet bun was tasty, the soup was tasty, the dumplings were not.

After my complaint, they contacted me and said that they had fixed a "compliment" or "apology" for me - I don't remember... they ordered in the winter of 2021.

SECOND delivery - 07/21/21: 2 business lunches and one soup....One of the soups almost spilled because the lid was not properly closed. And again NOT SIGNED... Again we stood wondering who had which. Each consisted of three halves of an egg, pieces of meat and noodles...they differed only slightly in color.
My lunch included sushi. There is almost no fish (((Poor and "disgusting"...
The soup was okay.

So what's it like there? Can you buy some markers so you can sign the soups for delivery?

Another fact: we ordered sushi for pickup and was told that my "compliment" does not work in this situation...only for delivery...So what?
They apologized over the phone, but they got screwed again because they didn't make amends and didn't even do what they promised.

I am changing the review to 3 stars.

The quality department called me again... they apologized and offered as many as two compliments (for two stiff shoals of soups that were repeated with a break of 3-4 months... that is, the service does not change in delivery). They offered to bring it in an hour...but it so happened that I am at the office until 5:00 p.m., so they brought it home at approximately 6:30 p.m.

What was included in the compliment: an identical set (8 rolls) from my lunch-lunch🙄, with the same amount of fish...you can't feel it in these sushi🤔
and rice chips.

Draw your own conclusions...

Checks and stubs below ↘

Good afternoon, my name is Kateryna and I am a representative of Tipme.


Our company has developed a convenient service with which you can very easily receive contactless tips.


To leave a tip, the client does not need cash or a terminal. He just needs to scan the tip device with his phone, choose the amount and click Google Pay or Apple Pay.


 


There are 3 options for tip devices:


1) tip bracelets


Comfortable, stylish and waterproof.


2) tip-cube


Resistant, not afraid of water.


3) Tip icon


Light, clings to clothes, attracts attention.


 So, I suggest you try to use our service in test mode. That is, for a certain period of time, we give you these devices, you use them and give feedback on how you use the device in general (it's all free of charge), if you like everything, we continue cooperation with you.


If this offer is interesting, I can provide more detailed information at the meeting.


 


I am waiting for feedback.

They placed orders on the set's website and chose "Self-pickup -20%" because they were close to the restaurant and could pick up the order in person. I emphasize that THIS CONDITION IS NOT INDICATED ANYWHERE ON THE SITE. As for the "do not disturb" button, as such there is no one on the site, there is another - "call back to confirm the order", but it must be pressed additionally, which I did not do, and if I did, then I would know that discounts are not will be. Please tell me, how should I know all this information, if it is not specified when ordering?

- no paper menu. - If you already have an electronic menu, why not add an image or a short description of the dishes? What's the point in that list of dishes with price tags if you don't know most Georgian names? 11.09.2021 around 14:00 in the afternoon we visited the "Tbiliso" restaurant, we were very disappointed. We were simply not served! The weather was beautiful, the sun was shining, and we immediately decided to sit outside, scanned the menu, decided on a choice and began to wait for the waiter. The waitress came out, but as it turned out not to us, but she needed to open the window for the visitors who were sitting on the terrace, and left. She didn't even say hello to us, didn't ask if we decided or not, she behaved as if we didn't exist at all. It's not pleasant!:-(( We sat for another 20 minutes and nothing. No one came out or approached us! The waiters just stood there and calmly talked among themselves, not paying attention to the customers. If this is how you treat visitors - you simply won't have them left. As much as we liked the establishment, we were disappointed by the staff, who should be the face of the establishment and its heart, and they take the courage to choose whom we want to serve, whom we don't want to serve. It's a shame I ask you to pay attention to the restaurant administration, to the work of your staff and to have a conversation, you don't want to go back to a place where you are not expected!

Today, a family with children visited Salateira. Ordered 2 Caesars and Simpl. Everything went great, but at the stage of extradition, there were problems one after another. While we were waiting, a woman came up and asked how there are no shrimps in the shrimp salad. - It was very alarming. Then they began to issue our order, and one Caesar looked like half a portion. We asked to prevail, but from 430 grams the first 330 turned out, and the other 350, imagine, is it possible? The deception is complete, apparently it is a "command-order" of managers to underestimate the weight !! Asked to add a salad, they respond to drying, so why even give half a salad? Then they took it, brought it to the table and it turned out that they forgot the crackers for both Caesars :) the second time it was not funny. In fact, a real mess lately in this institution. And to say that I paid cheaply for a check is not true, because for 430 UAH it is decent money for just a salad. It is a pity that the management does not control the whole process as other institutions do. We love salad dressing, but sometimes every thing crosses the line!

I want to tell you about one of my favorite restaurants of Georgian cuisine. 🥟

We are usually greeted with Georgian hospitality.☺️
We took a seat by the window and had the opportunity to enjoy the Rusanivska Embankment.🍀
Ordering is done by QR code, it's very convenient, you don't need to wait for the menu until they come to you, you already know what to order.
Georgian music plays in the institution, you are immediately transported to Georgia.😍
The interior is colorful, you can try on Georgian clothes and take bright photos.📽
The prices in the establishment are average, the portions are large.😚
Our top favorite dishes:
Chicken tobacco
Chicken kebab
Khinkali veal-pork, lamb
Khachapuri are all delicious
It is also worth trying home-made lemonades, young wine.🍷
The service is good, there were nuances, but you can close your eyes to them, because the taste of the food is at a high level.👩🏼‍🍳
There is a system of buns on the first visit and if you have the Tbilisi application, you get free gifts and also accumulate points that you can then spend on food.🍝🥙🍖🍗🥘
Also, every Tuesday, if you have a receipt from the previous visit, you get 1+1 khinkali.👍🏻
Use Lifehacks and wonder about my kindness.☺️

But I was pleasantly surprised not by this, but by the quick reaction to the comment that I actually wanted to leave to share my impression, not to express dissatisfaction. While I was in the restaurant, a polite girl approached me, the director of the establishment (if I understood correctly), although it was not a problem, it was not her fault at all, she apologized for the inconvenience and offered tea to warm up. A simple example: I decided to have a party at 1 pm (taking into account traffic jams, so I ordered pizza at 12.45 so that we would have time !!). It confused me, but I agreed. Delivery was made at 13.35 (50 minutes later than ordered - and the celebration at work and a meeting in 20 minutes ....). For the company of the supplier clarified when he took my order and (WONDERFUL !!!) it turned out that he took it at 13.20 ONLY AFTER I STARTED INTEREST IN MANAGERS WHERE MY PIZZA !!!!! In a word - you can order from them, BUT CALL THEM IN TWENTY MINUTES, so that managers "accidentally" do not forget about you!

Rested 13.02.2022 in the institution. Celebrated 40 years of parents' wedding.
Of the pros:
Everything is very tasty
The presence of a children's room
+/- fast service
Of the minuses, for which the stars were removed:
There was a misunderstanding with the waiter, extra sauce was added to the check (UAH 15, but not pleasant)
There was a complete defeat in the children's room (I understand that children play there, but when we came, it was empty, I think you can allocate 10 minutes to decompose things in places).
Well, the most unpleasant thing is that the law was violated and 10% was charged for service in the check.
Of course, I did not spoil my parents' holiday, we quietly settled down and left.
Be prepared for such unpleasant surprises.
By the way, previously the fine for such a violation was UAH 8,500.

I sent my feedback by e-mail to office@ilmolino.ua, but the system wrote that there was some error user quota exceeded, so I am duplicating the text of the letter here. Unfortunately, I can't add more than one photo here, so I'm adding only one. Contact me somehow and I will send you an e-mail and all the photos to it.
Order 88483


Good day. My name is Mykola, I always order pizza delivery from you. This time I decided to order "Quadro pizzette". (hereinafter, under the word "pizza" I will assume that it is one of these four "pizzattes"). Your website states that there will be 4 pizzas with a diameter of 18 centimeters, the total weight of the four pizzas is 535 grams. After we tasted half of the three pizzas, I decided to weigh the whole fourth (and four cheeses). By weight, it turned out to be 82 grams (the plate in the photo is tare, the scales are tare). I also wanted to weigh the other three pizzas, but, unfortunately, one was completely eaten, the other two were half eaten. I can make an assumption that if they are the same size, then they have the same weight. Also, based on the fact that the 4 cheese pizza does not correspond to the declared weight, I doubt that the pizzas correspond to the declared dimensions (18 cm in diameter), in fact they are something in the region of 14-15 centimeters. Perhaps, due to such a deviation of the actual diameter from the diameter declared on the website, the pizzas do not correspond to the declared weight.
So, I think that I was a little "weighted". If you calculate, then 535 / 4 will be equal to 133.75. The error is everywhere, so I will assume that the weight of each of the four pizzas should be somewhere around 115-120 grams.
I add a photo:
1 photo - pizzas immediately after delivery, just brought.
Photo 2 - a screenshot of the site, which shows the pizza parameters
3 photos - photos of pizza 4 cheeses on a vase
4 photos - a photo of the check
5 photos - photos of 4 cheeses and a ruler above it (the ruler is attached to the pizza quite close, but not close to it)
Photo 6 - a photo of a daisy (the one with a leaf in the center) and the ruler above it (the same as in photo 5)
All photos were taken 5-10 minutes after delivery, so in my opinion the weight of the pizza could not have "evaporated" or the pizza could not have "dried out" and reduced in size in such a short period of time.
So, please take my feedback into consideration and provide some kind of response to my letter.
Best regards,
Mykola Burba

Made an order at 12:30 for 15:45. Immediately after registration on the website, they called back for confirmation. She also noted about herself that they work very promptly. The specialist on the phone said that the delivery will be +-10 minutes from the specified time. Ok, it suits me, everything has been confirmed.
At 15:55, already during the children's holiday, the courier is still not there. I'm calling to find out, because there should be a snack break at 4:10 p.m. according to the holiday regulations. On the phone, they say that this is how we see your order, but it is still being prepared. They promise to find out the details within 2 minutes and call back. It takes 10, 20 minutes, maybe more, there is no answer to my calls. Finally, they still answer me and say that there was a technical failure and your order is still being prepared... it is being prepared, the clock shows about 4:20 p.m.... they promise something as a gift, some additional pizza, but I have to wait another 90 minutes... Why do I need your additional pizza or something else? something, when in 90 minutes the children will already be eating the cake😡
They themselves have somehow gotten out of position regarding the children's table. She did not refuse the order, but she said that if the courier does not come after the promised 1 hour and 15 minutes, then I will not pay for the order either. They said something else on the phone, about some "buns", but I didn't remember that, because I was going over in my head what to feed the children now. After about the specified time, the food was still delivered. The amount was less, about 10%. It must have been the buns they told me about, but I didn't hear them. The courier said that the failure occurred, most likely, due to air alarms and the order was transferred to another restaurant, where it seems that there was no light for a certain time. But I want to note that during this period of time, there were no aerial ones. So don't blame everything on "today's difficulties". Regarding the light, I understand that it can be. But, at least someone called and informed about a possible delay!? Unfortunately no(
Of course, there are no questions for the courier, I saw how he was worried and in a hurry. I don't have any complaints about the girl who still answered me on the phone at 4:20 p.m., even though she heard a lot from me. I want to apologize to the girl. She is not guilty of this and simply acted according to her working algorithm. And I ask the responsible persons and their management to pay attention to this situation. Unfortunately, the almost flawless reputation of il Molino is ruined after this situation both for me and for our friends who were present at the party.
Two stars - precisely for the food. Salads, pizzas, snacks, lasagna, etc. were ok, but not on time. In particular, timing played a major role here.

On November 23, 2022, the restaurant warned us that the delay time for pizza preparation would be 10 minutes. We agreed. After an hour of waiting, after our request, we were told that they would start preparing it soon. I understand everything, because this is the situation in the country, but I will write:
The restaurant is in the building next to me, 5 minutes on foot, but the delivery was announced after two hours. They also offered to change the order for pickup. For self-delivery, they said that it would be faster, within an hour, and they would definitely call in advance when it was ready.
I agreed to it.
More than an hour has passed - there was no call. I decided to type myself and it turned out that the pizza was already ready.
I went to pick up the pizza, it is clear that it was no longer hot, because it was already ready and I was not informed.
In addition, the delivery fee (+ UAH 35) was indicated during registration, and during delivery I indicated a tip to the courier who will deliver the order (+ UAH 75).
Already at home on the check, I noticed that these amounts were charged to me despite the fact that the pizza was not delivered to me and I went to pick it up myself.

So, in general, we waited a long time, there was no call either in advance or when it was ready, and it is also not clear to whom and why I paid for the delivery and which courier was tipped if the order was changed to self-delivery.

Amazing service. Pre-order - the promo code did not go through, although before that the manager said that everything is OK, the promo code is valid. Then 40 minutes later they called and said no. This time they also said that the promo code is not valid for UAH 200, and last time it was valid, only you need to make an order for UAH 750. I did it on 750, they called back and said that the deadline had passed and they were supposed to send a message, but they didn't. That's why they said that there will be an order with a promotional code.
They did not inform that they go up to the 5th floor without light. The light in the house was on, she warned the courier that it had not yet been turned off according to the schedule. To which he said that he would only go up to the 5th floor. I said that there is light, so you can go up, but understanding that I would not get stuck in the elevator, I agreed to go down to the 5th floor. I went down to 5, and the courier is already waiting for 7. Then in the check, I ordered for UAH 841 (-200 according to the promo code), I have to give 641, I left the apartment and took it without the rest, the courier shows the check for 647, where 1 is corrected with a pen to 7. So why not warn? Why not call back and say that the amount is different? Why not warn and say that the courier may not want to go up when there is light and only until 5 a.m. Realizing that he still has to carry an order and it is better not to get stuck in the elevator, I went down, but warn about that

Impressions remained ambiguous. I really liked the attitude and quality of service. For this, a solid 5. The order was accepted immediately, they promised to deliver it in 1-1.15 hours. However, it was delivered in 40-45 minutes. This is excellent. The quality of the packaging, the temperature of the pizza is just great. 100% satisfied. The service is excellent. As for the taste of the pizza, not everything is as good as the service. Neither me nor my wife liked Trio Salami pizza at all. Neither the sauce nor the salami worked together. Maybe there was not enough more cheese, it was too spicy. The paper guests themselves, but the red sauce also added even more spiciness, and I would have liked it to be the other way around. Pizza Cotto Bene, much better, especially against the backdrop of Trio Salami. Here both the sauce and the balance of the overall taste worked best. Good pizza.
Therefore, if evaluated separately, pizza trio salami - 3, pizza cotto bene - 4+, service and delivery 5++.

The food is delicious, but unfortunately the service is very slow. Slow does not mean a long wait for food. Namely in service. For half of the stay, dirty dishes accumulated and stood on the table. The dishes were removed only after we managed to catch the waiter and asked to remove them. A strange line for takeaway drinks. It takes a minute to pour a glass of wine, but it was brought to us after all the lemonades and cocktails we expected. And even to pay, we waited 20 minutes until the waiter noticed us. I come to a decent establishment, why do I have to wave my hands like a windmill to pay the bill? I can't say that our waiter was leaning against the wall all the time. He was running somewhere, but every time I had to look at him and attract attention so that he would come. I don't know what the reason is, maybe we just need more waiters, because 2 waiters and the administrator can't cope. The kitchen did its job well, everything was tasty and on time. The only thing I would like to receive is a roll in which all pieces have the same filling, because for some reason, in the roll with crab mix, there are crab sticks in all pieces, and in the roll with salmon, the outermost pieces are without salmon. This is not the first time we visit your chain of institutions, in general everything went well, as always, but there are a few nuances:
- they refused to provide the cork fee service, although even before the New Year in an institution near Fine Town they solved this issue without any problems (I don't know, maybe something has changed in the rules)
- the service could be better, the waiters were confused and did not have time to place orders (drinks were brought hot later, some were never brought at all)
- brandy was included in the final bill, which was ordered, but was not actually served to us. I understand that this is most likely a simple mistake, but you need to be at least a little more attentive, especially since the establishment was far from full. The waiter laughed a lot when he offered to pour brandy "to take away", the first time I've heard that :)
- the cuisine has also changed a little and not for the better, especially the lobio - it has become more watery and lost its piquancy. In general, I would like to note the very poor amount of spices and herbs inherent in Georgian cuisine

Доброго дня! 
Вчора були у вас в ресторані на Вербицького 1 «Нью Вей». Після відвідування вашого ресторану ми зробили висновок, що до вас більше ніколи не прийдемо. 
Ми прийшли біля сьомої години. Замовили лимонад манго- маракуйа, салат цезар, сирники, тріо салямі, картоплю фрі, спрайт. 
В мене було день народження і ми хотіли його відсвяткувати. 
Коли ми прийшли нас ніхто не привітав. Ми самі обрали стіл. Офіціант підійшов досить швидко. Я одразу спитала, чи є якісь пропозиції до дня народження. Офіціант сказав що не знає і зараз уточнить. Також повідомив, що був день вина і ми можемо обрати собі безкоштовні келихи вина. Я попросила почекати, бо сестра відійшла, а я не дуже розуміюсь в алкогольних напоях. Офіціант пішов ЯК МЕНІ ЗДАЛОСЯ уточнювати з приводу др. 
Ми почали обирати страви. Потім офіціант повернувся. Я попросила нам порекомендувати піци з мʼясом. Нам запропонували тріо салямі яка гостра та не підходить для дитини 5 років. Про то, що це для дитини я уточнювала. Також порекомендували для дитини лимонад. Я спитала чи він холодний. Мені відповіли, що ні, що для дітей підійде. Принесли графін льоду!!! Великими шматками льод був накидан в графічні і, звичайно, діти не могли пити. Офіціант прийняв замовлення і нічого не сказав про пропозиції до дня народження. 
Поки ми чекали страви побачили реклами з додатком ресторана. І завантажили його. Ніхто нам не запропонував його завантажити. В додатку ми побачили, що можемо обрати ще безкоштовний лимонад. Повідомили офіціанту про це, який нам відповів « а??? Ви завантажили додаток?» І ПІШОВ. потім повернувся з лимонадом. Ні яких слів типу «добре, зараз принесу, чудово тощо». Мене дуже засмутило, що я просила порекомендувати піцу для дітей і офіціант порекомендував ГОСТРУ піцу і ВСЕ. 
Салат цезар був смачний, сирники всі були залиті сметаною та сливовим джемом і мені довелось витирати їх, щоб дитина могла їсти.
Офіціант виніс нам їжу та один келих вина. Нас дорослих було двоє! Офіціант нічого не уточнював коли сестра повернулась, тому я самостійна спитала що там з вином. Він мовчки пішов і просто виніс один келих вина на свій розсуд. Офіціант повідомив також, що до дня народження вони пригощають піцою 4 сири. Я відповіла, що це чудово. Коли ми вже доїли салямі, залишився один шматочок,я спитала де подарунок піца на день народження. Офіціант сказав «ви не підтвердили, що хочете її отримати!». Це просто жах. Нема слів. Я ПІДТВЕРДИЛА, що хочу її отримати. Нам її винесли. Але так як всі були вже ситі я попросила, щоб нам запакували її з собою. Потім коли ми почали розраховуватись карткою підійшла дівчинка для розрахунку. Привіталась і розрахувала нас. Вже вдома ми помітили, що в додатку залишилось 500 балів до дня народження і не зарахували 106 балів за замовлення у закладі. Чому так? Чому в інших ресторанах Вашої мережі ( наприклад раніше ми ходили в дрім таун неодноразово, колись давно на золотих воротах були та одного разу на академ містечку) мене завжди питали чи мені сподобалось, чи було смачно. Завжди мене зустрічали при вході, вітались та прощались. А тут таке відношення типу я їм винна за те, що мені щось надають. В ресторані крім нас було тільки два стола зайняті. Не було натовпу через який нам би могли не приділити достатньо часу. 
Додатково піца салямі була підгоріла.

It's been a long time since I last ordered pizza from Il Molino. Before the quarantine and the war, this was our favorite location. So we decided to do ourselves a favor and order two pizzas for a family holiday.
Impression:
1) The cost of the order turned out to be much higher than we expected, because we added other ingredients (we were informed that the price would be different, and we agreed, because it is the tastiest pizza in Kyiv);
2) Picked up self-pickup from Prospect shopping center. Everyone who communicated with us performed the work, as if under duress. Half-empty hall, I came for pizza, paid almost 800 hryvnias. - not a single smile, "good day" on duty and that's it. It seems that they were not happy to see me.
3) the pizza was packed sloppily, the long ends of the rope were hanging from the sides, I had to pick them up and cut them myself. Is it some kind of difficult task - to tie and cut exactly? This child can do better.
4) One of the pizzas (Bavarian) was filled with sauce so much that it was oozing and it was unpleasant to eat.

The only thing that was like before the pandemic was the unique taste of the dough and the fact that the pizza was hot. Everything else is very sad, and the careless attitude towards the customer (essentially the lack of service culture) is a shame. This was not the case before.

First of all, I want to say that I really like your pizza. But twice in a row I have not been able to eat it hot.

For example. Today, July 27, I ordered a pizza at a restaurant on Knyazum Ostrozki Street. Pickup at 6:30 p.m. Was in the restaurant at 18:25. My pizza was already ready, and far from hot, it was barely warm. I can walk home for 5 minutes, and in that time the pizza has become completely cold.
There was a similar situation last time, on 21.07, and then I came at the exact time specified.

In this regard, I have a question: if I order a pizza for a specific time, how long should I arrive so that the pizza is hot?
Or is it possible to make the pizza hot exactly at the time specified in the order?

Unpleasant experience of self-delivery of ordered pizza through. I made the registration through the website, no one called back about the readiness of the order, when an hour later I called myself, found out that it had been ready for a long time. I brought it home, it was almost cold. The pizza was at the admin counter, the admin had free time, all the contact details were there to get in touch with me. No automatic messages came from the site. When ordering on the website, there is no information about the time of preparation of the order or a note that we do not call. In practice, the time it takes to prepare an order depends on how busy the establishment is, it can be 20 minutes, it can be 1 hour. As a rule, when ordering take-out, the establishment, accepting the order, says how long to come or calls about readiness.

In your case, after placing an order on the website, I need to immediately call the institution and find out about the order fulfillment time, or sit in the institution or take a courier. Then what is the point of pickup through the site?


 If I want to order takeout, the following options are available
1) courier for UAH 50, not interesting, the distance from the restaurant is several entrances to my house
2) to order a take-out in a restaurant, you need to wait for the pizza to be prepared, instead of working in parallel.
3) order through the website with pickup. It works poorly, I wrote above

I am DISAPPOINTED with this set. The order was made in Dreamtown, the first and LAST time I was in this Sushi. First of all, we were warned that the alarm had started and they said "we will quickly wrap it up and take it out for you" - maybe we need not only fast, but also high-quality? Secondly, the roles are as different as possible in life and in the picture. (I buy this set all the time, both in Avalanche and Gulliver, and I have always been satisfied, but I have never experienced such horror as today). The rolls are small in size, some of them have "emptiness" in the filling, they all FALL DOWN 🙂 a piece of fish also surprised me, this set was much sweeter and tastier in Gulliver and Avalanche. Moreover, they put 2 napkins - ONLY 2, my God, is this saving on napkins? ALSO, they counted 3 sticks (indicated in the receipt), but put only 2 in the bag. In addition, ginger and wasabi were put as one portion, that is, only for one person. (I have a photo, but the site does not allow me to attach more photos, so I made a collage). UAH 680 for this - definitely NO. Left hungry, in a bad mood and with a ruined day. This is the first time I am writing such a review, and I am not a nervous person or a brawler, I just sincerely did not like giving money and spoiling my lunch.
Please correct this situation.
Valeria - 0637848339.
I hope the review gets noticed, otherwise this kind of customer focus is very strange.
(I can also send you an additional photo in Viber so that you can compare which sets were served in Avalanche and which were served in Dreamtown).

Since we love Tbilisi, I will leave the general impression of the company. First the pros:
1. Everything is delicious (except the meat is unsurpassed. The lavash underneath is super. Thin and wet)
2. Friendly (it was comfortable with Tamerlan)

Now the cons
1. I understand that it was Friday and we did not pre-order, but many things were not available - lemonades, snacks

2. Salads were served without spoons
3. Khinkali was carried/prepared for a long time
4. They carried the bar for a very long time at the beginning.
Drinks were brought, but the pretty glasses were waiting for more. Considering the fact that we had drinks in decanters (without each a separate drink and they are all different — it takes a long time)
5. The air conditioner dripped onto the chair at our table. This is not the first time ((
6. The bar in terms of "pleasantness to the DN has fallen." This is the second birthday celebrated in Tbilisi. For the first, they brought us a large cake and 0.5 of wine. This time there was wine (however, they didn't tell us that this is for you to the DN from Tbilisi). + the cake is now a piece. The question is not in quantity, but in human perception. When you lower the bar, people will notice. I hope our review will be useful

Then the salad, after a few minutes they brought 3 portions of khinkals (we ordered 2), we didn't understand why they brought us another item. They told the waiter about it. We thought maybe the table got confused (another waiter, not the one who took the order, was already bringing out the khinkali). He took the extra plate and left. Our waiter, who was taking the order, came back to us and said pretentiously, "in the sense that you didn't order, I repeated this order with you." From that moment it was not pleasant to be in the institution. Then we waited another 30 minutes for khachapuri, which was already brought to us by the 3rd waiter.

Congratulations. On 05.12.2023, at approximately 20:10, we received an order at "il Molino" at the address: Kyiv, str. Knyazov Ostrozkih, 17 - 2 pizzas: Milano and Margarita. First of all: the pizzas do not correspond to the ingredients declared on the website, and also differ in appearance in general, unfortunately not for the better (photos are attached). Milano - sausages of several pieces, placed disproportionately. Margarita - without basil. Secondly: the size of the pizzas indicated on the website is 30 cm, in fact they differ, as can be seen in the photo, of course on the smaller side. I would like to ask the management of the establishment, taking into account the status of the establishment and the price of pizza, is it not possible to do their work better, so that customers get pleasure from food, and not disappointment and smiles when unpacking the pizza? Considering the above, we do not recommend this institution!

Breakfast was brought already cold, although it is not clear why, because they ordered scrambled eggs with bacon, potato triangles and cherry tomatoes, a light dish that takes 10-15 minutes to prepare and must be hot. We contacted the administrator, thank you, of course, for giving a discount on this breakfast, but the impression is no longer the same. Plus they asked for bread for breakfast, they waited 10 minutes, everything is not difficult here either. They also ordered tea and asked to bring lemon to it, usually, in your restaurant, they served lemon cut into slices on a separate plate, but today 2 quarters were added to the teapot, it's just a match, sorry. The tea was bitter due to the abundance of lemon. And in addition to all this, after serving all the dishes and bread, they asked the waiter to bring the bill right away, and again they waited for 10-15 minutes. Although seating in the restaurant itself was not maximum and there were not many guests. I understand all situations, maybe it all seems easy, but it would be possible to just approach and inform that at the moment the service is a little delayed, and they simply forgot about the client, until the client himself approached the waiter and the administrator. Unfortunately, that's not all... after breakfast, after 3-4 hours, I felt bad, nausea and heaviness. There were no other meals before and after breakfast, so I can assume that it is possible because of this. Before, your service and food was a pleasure and I wanted to come more often, but now unfortunately not. Thank you for attention!

Yesterday evening (January 9, 2024), I had dinner with my wife in a restaurant near Finetown.
First, they could not use the discount coupon because it was the day of Khinkala. Perhaps it is written somewhere in small print that you cannot use the coupon on the day of Khinkali!?
Secondly, our order (khachapuri, pork kebab and lamb kebab, fries) took a very long time to prepare! When the kebab was brought, the side dish (potatoes) was cold.
Thirdly, the fries were generally brought very late, and moreover, they were kind of sour. We did not eat it.
Fourth, I ordered an extra coke. The glass that was brought to me was apparently clean, but it had a certain smell. I did not drink from it, but drank cola from a bottle.
Fifth, when they brought the bill, they included the cost of khachapuri, although at the beginning I told the waiter that I would pay with points. I had to remind again.
Sixth, even the program failed and did not calculate the bonuses the first time, but the waiter noticed it and corrected everything.
So yesterday we were a little disappointed with the institution and decided not to go to it yet.

On 19.01 we ordered sushi from you. Ordered at 5:00 p.m. The operator said that the order will be within 1 hour - 1.15, and maybe even earlier. 1 hour and 10 minutes passed. We recruited an operator. He said that the courier would be there in 15 minutes. My boyfriend and I went outside. Then another 15 minutes passed and finally the courier contacted us. A courier who does not focus on the area from the word at all. They tried to find him by phone for half an hour. They ran all over the residential complex in search of his car, and it's -10! Then they reset their geolocation on Viber, which didn't help either. For some reason, the courier decided that he was at the right address, but he was not. It was 3 km from us, as it turned out later. Another 10 minutes later, a photo of the wheel of his car and the inscription "I'm in trouble" arrives on Viber. I remind you, 2 hours have passed since the order was placed. They were exhausted as much as possible by the search for a courier and disappointed by this situation. Special thanks to the operators who tried their best to solve the problem and to another courier who picked up our order and delivered it quickly. Conclusion: we received our order at 19:30;( Usually everything is fine with your delivery. On time, always very tasty and there were no complaints. But this time... We hope that there will be no more such situations and the couriers will be more attentive and fast .

We negotiated with the manager about the payment of the order, it was clarified that the rest of UAH 2,000 was needed (the order was for 1,730), the courier said that there was no rest, that some department was already closed and the order was simply redirected to him. I started to get dressed to go look for open shops to change money, when I left the apartment he started going through bills in his wallet and said that maybe he will find the rest now. I stand in shock. She asked me to find UAH 250 and leave UAH 20 as a tip. He gave me bills for 5 minutes, as if he was waiting for me to stop him and tell him to keep the money. I gave 240 and he asks, do I need to give another 10 hryvnias? Despite the fact that I already gave a tip. Needless to say, I went home and closed the door. Is this some new type of service you have or what? We order your sushi because it is well made + large pieces of fish. This time the sushi looked small-medium-large, unevenly cut, it felt as if they were simply collected from different sets and thrown into ours. You have no desire to order anything more.

The order was lost (#11705655). That's in short. The reason for this is that "three rams and one Russian" work in this institution (quoted by the sister). The order was made on 07.01 through the application at 15:53. After a difficult journey from Zaporozhye, we decided to quickly order a pizza. The app said it would be ready at 4:23 p.m. At 16:26 they called me back (+380444999940) for confirmation and informed me that the order is already being prepared. At 16:50 we were at the institution. At the entrance, when I told about the order, men (there were 3 of them in total) came up to the counter one by one, made round eyes and disappeared somewhere WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION. This lasted for 10 minutes. The first rule is to never make the client wait without information, it is better to clearly tell the truth. Then these young gentlemen were afraid to approach us and simply hid near the kitchen, avoiding contact with the problem. The order never came. Then the head of delivery came and in the language of terrorists began to explain how tragically and mistakenly he lost the order... The only thing I understood was that the order had not even started to be prepared!!! For another 10 minutes, he ran to us and to the kitchen, showing my order in his hands (THE NUMBER MATCHED)!!!! And in another 15 minutes, the order was finally ready. The second rule is to serve customers exclusively in the state language! This is the language of the enemy. It was very unpleasant for me that he told me in Russian that he was doing his job very poorly. Especially after a difficult week in the front-line zone. I hope this NEVER happens again. You have serious communication problems. I will never leave a tip in advance in the app again.
